data.event: The community is a popular summer resort beach town situated on the Atlantic Ocean, north of Boston on the New Hampshire border.

event.title: was settled by the English in 1638

data.event: It was settled by the English in 1638 as Colchester, and incorporated in 1640 as Salisbury, after Salisbury in Wiltshire, England.
It was settled by the English in 1638 as Colchester, and incorporated in 1640 as Salisbury, after Salisbury in Wiltshire, England.
Those roads still exist, though the shape today is triangular, being bounded by Elm Street, School Street and Bridge Road.
